src:
Mie Instan Campur Es Teh Manis Racikan Netizen, Siapa Mau?
02 Nov 2019, 02:00 by Riska Fitria - detikFood


Foto: twitter @SoundOfYogi

Jakarta - Ada-ada saja ulah netizen yang satu ini saat menyantap mie instan. Rasa gurih mie instan dicampur dengan es teh manis. Gimana ya rasanya?Netizen di media sosial memang dikenal paling kreatif. Mereka berani mencoba hal baru bahkan yang terbilang gila sekalipun. Seperti yang dilakukan oleh netizen di twitter dengan nama akun @soundofyogi. Netizen bernama Yogi tersebut membagikan sebuah video kegilaannya pada (28/10)."Siapa lagi yang meragukan? Indomie + es teh manis = enak," tulis Yogi melalui cuitannya.


Foto: twitter @SoundOfYogi

Dalam video yang berdurasi sekitar 1 menit tersebut ia memperlihatkan semangkuk mie instan kuah lengkap dengan telur.Kemudian ia juga memperlihatkan segelas es teh manis yang juga telah disiapkan."Indomie, es teh manis, mari kita campur," ucapnya dalam videotersebut.Baca Juga : Viral! Akun Twitter 'Agama Indomie' yang Bikin Ngakak Netizen Tak main-main ternyata, setelah mencampurkan mie instan dengan es teh manis, Yogi juga memperlihatkan dirinya yang berani memakan mie instan tersebut. Bahkan di video tersebut ia mengatakan bahwa rasanya sangat enak.


Foto: twitter @SoundOfYogi

"Hmmm, enak banget men," ucapnya.Tentunya video kegilaan netizen tersebut tak lepas dari komentar netizen lainnya. Sayangnya kebanyakan netizen justru mengecam aksi gila yang dilakukan Yogi. Banyak dari mereka yang mengatakan bahwa Yogi hanya mencari sensasi saja."Dasar selebtweet sengaja buat sensasi buat pansos," tulis salah satu netizen."Nda bermutu banget, mubazir iya," tulis netizen lainnya.


Foto: twitter

Namun, diantara komentar negatif netizen, terselip komentar yang justru menunjukkan aksi yang tak kalah lebih gila lagi. Yaitu dengan membuat agar-agar yang dicampur mie instan. Netizen dengan nama akun @aiueoba1 tersebut juga memperlihatkan penampilan dari agar-agar mie instan buatannya."Agar-agar indomie," tulisnya saat membalas cuitan Yogi.Dalam foto agar-agar yang dibagikan oleh netizen tersebut memperlihatkan penampilan agar-agar yang di dalamnya terdapat campuran mie instannya. Ketika agar-agar tersebut dibuka, nampak tampilan mie yang ikut membeku di dalam agar-agarnya."Demi apa demi apa jadi agar-agar dong indomienya," tulis salah satu netizen yang terkejut.Baca Juga : Masak Mie Instan 200 Bungkus, YouTuber Ini Pakai Kolam Renang untuk Wadah Simak Video "Slurpp! Milenial Wajib Coba Nih Mie Instan Kuah Susu Boba"[Gambas:Video 20detik](raf/odi)
text:
Instant Noodle Mixing Iced Tea Sweet Blend Netizens, Who Wants?
02 Nov 2019, 02:00 by Riska Fitria - detikFood


Photo: twitter @SoundOfYogi

Jakarta - What nonsense are these netizens doing when eating instant noodles. Savory taste of instant noodles mixed with sweet iced tea. How does it feel? Netizens on social media are known to be the most creative. They dare to try new things even though somewhat crazy. As done by netizens on twitter with the account name @soundofyogi. The netizen named Yogi shared a video of his madness on (28/10). "Who else doubts? Indomie + sweet iced tea = delicious," Yogi wrote through his tweet.


Photo: twitter @SoundOfYogi

In the video which lasted about 1 minute he showed a bowl of instant noodles with gravy complete with eggs. Then he also showed a glass of sweet iced tea that had also been prepared. "Indomie, sweet iced tea, let's mix," he said in the video. Read Also: Viral! The 'Indomie Religion' Twitter Account that Makes Laughter of Netizens Not kidding, apparently, after mixing instant noodles with sweet iced tea, Yogi also showed himself who dared to eat the instant noodles. Even in the video he said that it felt very good.


Photo: twitter @SoundOfYogi

"Hmmm, it's really good men," he said. Certainly the netizen's madness video could not be separated from other netizens' comments. Unfortunately most netizens actually condemned Yogi's crazy actions. Many of them said that Yogi was just looking for sensation. "The basis of a celebrity tweet is deliberately making sensations for pansos," wrote one netizen. "You are very high quality, wasteful yes," wrote another netizen.


Photo: Twitter

However, among netizens' negative comments, the comments tucked away show that the action is no less crazy. Namely by making jelly mixed with instant noodles. Netizens with the account name @ aiueoba1 also show the appearance of gelatin instant noodles he made. "Indomie gelatin," he wrote while replying to Yogi's tweet. In the photo jellies shared by netizens showed the appearance of gelatin inside the instant noodle mixture. When the jelly was opened, the display of noodles that froze in the jelly appeared. "For what sake is it for the sake of its gelatin," one of the shocked netizens wrote. Read Also: Cook 200 Instant Noodles, This YouTuber Use Swimming Pool for Containers See Video "Slurpp! Millennials Must Try Here Instant Noodles Boba Milk Noodles" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (raf / odi)
